name: Adidas Runners Move For The planet - Band Activation + Easy Run
about:
We’ll begin with a band warm-up, focused on mobility, activation, and injury prevention, reinforcing strong, sustainable movement. Then we’ll hit an easy pace for a community run, centred on connection and conscious effort.

🌱 Why it matters:
– Raises awareness for environmental impact through sport
– Promotes injury-free, mindful running
– Supports the global Move For The Planet initiative

This isn’t just a session—it’s a step toward a better planet.

name: Adidas Runners Fartlek Run & Mobility
about:
We’ll start with a functional mobility warm-up to prep the body, followed by a structured Fartlek run—a blend of varied pace intervals and recovery jogs. It's about listening to your body, pushing when it counts, and flowing when it doesn’t.

🔥 Benefits:
– Boosts aerobic & anaerobic capacity
– Improves agility, form & stride efficiency
– Enhances recovery and reduces injury risk

Whether you're chasing a new PR or just looking to break the routine, this session meets you where you are—and helps you level up.

name: Adidas Runners Strength Session
about: This session is designed to complement your running by improving mobility, stability, and total-body strength. Led by expert Cult trainers, expect a high-energy environment with functional movements, core work, and runner-specific drills.

name: Adidas Runners Strength Session
about: Level up your performance with a focused Strength Session at Cult. Designed to build muscle, improve stability, and enhance overall running efficiency, this workout targets key muscle groups runners rely on. Train smarter, get stronger, and stay injury-free – all in a high-energy, coach-led environment.

name: Adidas Runners Move For The Planet - Easy Run
about:
This isn’t about speed—it’s about solidarity. We’ll move together at a relaxed pace, making space for conversation, connection, and a shared commitment to protecting the planet we run on.

🌱 Why It Matters:
– Raise awareness around environmental impact
– Celebrate conscious movement
– Be part of a global initiative making a difference through sport

Whether you're a regular runner or just starting out, your steps count. Bring your energy, your crew, and your intention—we move as one.
